title: False Ban at end of season. First time hit gold and then MMR Bossting flag is raised!
body:
I worked hard this season to get out of bronze. I have to say this is annoying. Seeing being punished for working to get out of bronze succeeding and then getting banned! I will admit after hitting gold I quit playing ranked all together so I would stay at my rank. I do not know if this I the reason for the ban, but if it is that is crap. I would love to know the reason, and have opened a ticket support about this unjust ban.

Who else got banned this year!

replies.body:
Hate to break it to you but those champs are very strong high elo ones that completely stomp Bronze when you're good at them, which let's face it, not a lot of bronze players are.
Especially Kindred is something that no Bronze player would be good at.

idk your cs, kda's and win rates are really high for a Gold V player, I'm almost Plat and I don't even have scores close to those.
38 wins 3 losses with Kindred? at that rate you could of made Plat easy, 27/13 Kayle?
idk dude your profile does look suspicious, 93% win rate Kindered? 5.83:1 KDA?? ehhh idk man
SoloQ majority of those are doom bots and me playing champs I don't know in norms, don't be that troll.
That link only shows Ranked games, it's not a troll since that is what they are going off of.

We can't address these types of concerns here on the boards, but you'll be able to ask for additional context on your suspension inside your ticket.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Do you know how long the average response to a ticket is?

That's pretty hard for me to estimate, but I can confirm that response times are a bit longer than normal due to the end of season creating a large volume of submitted tickets.

An account specialist will reach back out on your ticket as soon as it's possible. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Same here...just got mmr boosting suspension even though ive never boosted. Support tickets seem to be only automated and no one will look into it again for me.

Yooooo mah dude, I was apparently banned for "scripting" but yet I'm still silver 3 and I bounce back and forth between S3 and S2, if I was scripting I wouldnt be in silver? I was perma banned for something I didnt do, and not to mention I've been playing since Season 2 and I've pumped at least 500 dollars into this account and now it's all gone...
Thing is I played Norms and continued at the Cs, and kill rates and win rates even after quitting ranked. Granted in norms I messed around with builds, but don't they look at that too?

I'll admit it looks suspicious but that champ was broken at the time and I clicked with her that patch. Besides I was getting tips as I was playing her from a diamond 4 during the games. Besides I have done higher kda's and win rates on other champs. Like Kayle and Garen.
Honestly if you thought I boosted months ago do it then not the day the season ends this is ridiculous!
